Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open Preferences in en-US version of FF7+
2. Select Content section/tab


Actual results:

"Fonts & Colours" is displayed (UK localization)


Expected results:

"Fonts & Colors" should be displayed (US)
